operation.name: setTransactionTimeout
operation.description: Sets the tx timeout in seconds

operation.name: getStatus
operation.description: Returns the status of the current tx, or STATUS_NO_TRANSACTION if none

operation.name: getTransaction
operation.description: Returns the tx associated with the current thread

operation.name: suspend
operation.description: Dissociates the current tx from the current thread

operation.name: resume
operation.description: Associates the supplied tx with the current thread, if no tx is currently associated

parameter.name: transaction
parameter.description: The transaction to be associated with the current thread

operation.name: setRollbackOnly
operation.description: Sets the current tx to only rollback
